summary: Global Activist Debate - A worldwide platform for activists to engage in civil or aggressive debates, share content (quotes/poems), and connect globally. Features user profiles, public debate forums, private messaging, moderation system with warnings/strikes, random debate matching, and mobile-responsive design.
architectural_notes: User authentication and registration system required for global access
Database schema: users (profiles, debate style, interests), posts (debate threads, content), moderation (warnings, strikes, reports)
Debate categorization: Civil vs Aggressive with different rule enforcement
Real-time or near-real-time messaging for private Activist Debate feature
Moderation dashboard for admins to review reports and manage warnings/strikes/bans
Random matching algorithm or manual pairing for debate partners
Responsive frontend framework for cross-device compatibility
Content moderation queue for reported violations
Avatar customization system with options for skin tones, hair types, and other visual personalization
Help/info system with animated UI and contextual usage guidance
known_issues: Avatar builder background color does not change when selected
Avatar design does not match reference aesthetic - characters look ugly and should have no eyes or face, only hair, clothing, and skin tone like the provided reference image
No UI exists for users to create new posts in any section
